thread.title: Wayne Thiebaud, Famed for the Art of Sweets, Has Portrayed Far More

author: Brenda Cronin
title: Wayne Thiebaud, Famed for the Art of Sweets, Has Portrayed Far More
text:
Wayne Thiebaud, the 97-year-old artist whose portraits of Boston cream pies and cherry-topped desserts have made him the court painter of the diner, can’t stop drawing. A page of sketches from 1986 has 11 different images, including landscapes, clouds and a head of Russian pianist Vladimir Horowitz.
Why Horowitz? While sketching, Mr. Thiebaud also was watching television and caught a recital by the pianist. “I sketch everywhere and almost anywhere,” Mr. Thiebaud says, “in theaters, in airports, at the beach or on vacation.”...
